channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on Shangeth
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on Shangeth

item.title: Off Policy Monte Carlo Prediction with Importance sampling
item.description: Off-Policy Monte Carlo with Importance Sampling Off Policy Learning Link to the Notebook By exploration-exploitation trade-off, the agent should take sub-optimal exploratory action by which the agent may receive less reward. One way of exploration is by using an epsilon-greedy policy, where the agent takes a nongreedy action with a small probability. In an on-policy, improvement and evaluation are done on the policy which is used to select actions.

item.title: Policy Based Reinforcement Learning
item.description: Policy based RL methods for Lunar lander and Cartpole environments.

item.title: Temporal Difference
